mapper.select: SELECT c.CommentIdx, c.SnsIdx, c.UserIdx, c.CommentContent, c.CreatedAt, u.UserNickname FROM comments c JOIN user u ON c.UserIdx = u.UserIdx WHERE c.SnsIdx = #{snsIdx} ORDER BY c.CommentIdx DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments (SnsIdx, UserIdx, CommentContent) VALUES (#{snsIdx}, #{userIdx}, #{commentContent})
